modName: Flame Glass Armor and Weapon Retexture
summary: A more interesting and certainly unique recolor of the Glass weapons and armor for male and female.
descriptionHtml:
Woohoo, this mod made the Skyrim mod video!  Not expecting that...  Especially since I don\'t consider it \'finished\' yet.  Very proud, nonetheless: [youtube]bjxQJtuOPi0[/youtube]

My very first mod.  Though I have been modding Bethesda games since FO3 (mainly via the Nexus), but I have not contributed diddly...  Until now.

I have never been impressed with the glass armor, mainly because of the color.  I wanted to do something more brilliant, and different from virtually everything else in the game.  This is what happened!  I really dig it, and I hope you do too.

I will likely keep tweaking this texture set until the end of time, and I will update.  Comments are welcome.

I thank every Nexus modder for making Skyrim on PC so rich and exciting!!

I am using the outstanding \"Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M\" by MAK (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004) for the screenshots, though the textures will work for the vanilla meshes or any other mesh that uses the stock texture layout.

Highly recommended with this retex is \'REAL Glass Weapons with realistic transparency\' by Joshawowo (install this BEFORE my mod, or you will overwrite my retex files) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9892

I am also posting an Orcish armor and weapon retex this evening.  Hope you dig that too!
author: Goliatron
